Tenten repeatedly hits her opponent with a pair of [[Wikipedia:Tonfa|tonfa]], then tosses a [[scroll]] in the air to summon a [[Wikipedia:Bō|bō]] and continues hitting them with it, ultimately knocking them to the ground. When the opponent is lying on the ground, she then summons a huge spiked club and crushes them with it.

[[es:Armas Manipuladas: Show de Giro Golondrina]]
[[pl:Sōgu: Kaien Geki]]
